title: league systems
body: just a curious question. im now trying to update to patch 6.18 but its still at 0% and at over 1300 files scanned. i was wondering if the systems being down for maintenance would be the cause for this?

replies.body: Maintenance wouldn't affect your patching.  If you've been stuck there for a while, then your patcher might not have permissions to write and read game files.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to allow access and get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
